item.title: Blindfolded algorithm visualizer
item.description: BLD algorithm visualizer This page allows you to search and look at the algorithms I use to solve the Rubik’s cube blindfolded (and 4x4, and 5x5). Enter BLD algorithm to visualize: Full alg: test Usage Guide Uhh Searching Commutators You can use Singmaster notation or the full commutator in SPEFFZ notation (although this will only allow you to search 3BLD algs).
